communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Kick off with blunt accusations or rhetorical questions; vary openings.

narratives.c_essay: I'm a 30-year-old volunteer firefighter with a marketing degree, trying to start my own grocery store. Living at home and being colorblind adds to my daily struggles, but I'm pushing forward with my entrepreneurial dreams.
narratives.p_intro: I'm incel_0023_797055, an angry voice against a society that's stacked against me. My dating failures fuel my resentment towards women and the social hierarchy that keeps me down.
